attributes.action: Have all new houses built with solar panels and or wind turbines where applicable built into them by law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Building energy saving devices into all new houses and extension's where applicable and in keeping with with the local area style ie; not in thatched roofs unless it can be discreetly disguised as thantch.

The effect of this would be less of a strain on future enegy supplies and helping to keep this country running, and costs down making us a more self sufficient country.
